captions.text:
Yes, ma'am, the data
on the mig is inaccurate.

Well, I just happened
to see a mig-28 do--

We...Happened to see a mig-28
do a four-g negative dive.

I could tell you,
but then I'd have to kill you.

The pentagon sees to it
that I know more than you.

Well, ma'am, it doesn't seem so
in this case, now, does it?

When he pulled
through the clouds,

And then I moved in
above him.

Well, if you were
directly above him,

It was a really great move.
He was inverted.

It was actually about
one and a half, I think.

It was one and a half.
I've got a great polaroid of it.

He's right there.
It must be one and a half.

Maverick: It was a nice picture.
Lieutenant.

Goose:
Thanks,
I like my pictures.

Yes, I know the finger,
goose.

I-I'm sorry, I hate it when
it does that. I'm sorry.

All right, gentlemen,
we have a hop to take.

The hard deck on this hop
will be 10,000 feet.

There'll be no engagement
below that.

title: I Was Inverted - Top Gun (3/8) Movie CLIP (1986) HD

comments.author: Wishful Thinking

comments.text:
+Wishful Thinking Not true. It was common knowledge that Val at that time 
was going through a significant crusty bread addiction. There were numerous 
points during filming in which his attempts at concealing it were exposed 
in some way. The exact part of the scene you are referring to is the 
only example of this that ended up within the final version (with some 
audio adjustment)
comments.author: Neale Weir

comments.text:
They film multiple sides of the hangar throughout the scene and select 
different camera angles during the editing process. I read it was true on 
IMDB anyway, and the reactions of the guys around him seem to suggest it's 
true.

comments.author: JRFrancisco20088

comments.text:
+Marcus Smith He's a pretty short dude. However, there are quite a few 
actors that are small, some even smaller. Mark Wahlberg is 5'8" even though 
they make him look average height on screen.

Actors that are 5'7" include: Al Pacino, Ben Stiller, Christian Slater, and 
Tom Cruise.

Actors that are 5'6": Jack Black, Daniel Radcliffe, Elijah Wood, and Woody 
Allen.

5'5": Dustin Hoffman  

5'4": Michael J Fox, Emilio Estevez, Joe Pesci, Richard Dreyfus, Jason 
Alexander, Rick Moranis, and Seth Green. 

And Danny Devito is 5'0". I'm sure there are more, that's just the one's I 
found. 

Some of those you might not even notice to be very small, or at least as 
small as they are. Not only does the screen make them look bigger, but they 
also use tricks like wearing very high shoes, standing on a box, or having 
the other cast members stand or walk in a ditch etc to make the person in 
question seem taller than they really are. For some it doesn't matter, and 
kind of makes them part of who they are, like Danny Devito and Joe Pesci 
for example.
